item.title: Samples
item.description:
Samples#

There are two samples in package, you can import them from PackageManager’s Samples tab and play around.

It seems that the Samples tab is only visible if the package is imported from disk. If it is downloaded from asset store directly, there will not be Samples tab.

If no Samples tab appears, you can also copy Realtime Area Lights/Samples~ folder to Assets.

item.title: Integration
item.description:
Integration#

The integration process is extreamely easy for both shader graph and shader code, no matter you are using an customized SRP render pipeline, or the offical Universal Render Pipeline.

This package works in isolation with render pipeline in most of the time, it extract surface parameters like roughtness, normal, metallic and so on from the render pipeline, do lighting calculation, then add the result back to the original render result.
